delivery.title: Quick Delivery & Installation
delivery.description: Delivered and installed within days – neatly mounted by our fixed team. You'll be ready for outdoor living in no time.

materials.title: High-Quality Materials
materials.description: We use only A-grade aluminum and European-made glass – weather-resistant, sturdy, and low-maintenance.

customers.title: Satisfied Customers
customers.description: More than 1500 satisfied customers in the Netherlands, Belgium, and Germany have chosen our verandas and blinds.

modern.title: Modern Veranda
modern.description: Custom modern veranda in Amsterdam with aluminum structure and clean lines. Perfectly suited for modern urban homes.

terrace.title: Terrace Pergola
terrace.description: Modern terrace pergola in Rotterdam with aluminum structure. Perfect for creating an additional outdoor living space.

sliding.title: Sliding Walls
sliding.description: Aluminum sliding wall in Düsseldorf with maximum light intake. Seamless transition between indoor and outdoor.

about.title: About Holland Veranda
about.description: Holland Veranda specializes in aluminum verandas, carports, pergolas, sliding walls, blinds, frames, and custom sun protection. With over 20 years of experience, we provide sustainable outdoor solutions in the Netherlands, Belgium, and Germany.

products.title: Our Products
products.subtitle: Discover our extensive collection of aluminum verandas, terrace covers, and custom outdoor solutions.

veranda.title: Veranda
veranda.description: Modern and stylish verandas custom-made for your home and garden. Our verandas provide extra living space and protection from the elements all year round.

carport.title: Carport
carport.description: Durable carports that protect your car from weather conditions and UV radiation. The open structure provides an airy appearance that matches any home.

terrasoverkapping.title: Terrace Cover
terrasoverkapping.description: A terrace cover provides shelter from rain and sun, allowing you to fully enjoy your outdoor space. Our terrace covers are available in various materials and styles, matching your home and preferences.

kozijnen.title: Window Frames
kozijnen.description: Our window frames are of high quality and available in various materials such as wood, plastic, and aluminum. They offer excellent insulation and are available in different colors and finishes.

schuifpuien.title: Sliding Walls
schuifpuien.description: A sliding wall is an elegant solution to connect your living room with the garden. Our sliding walls are available in various materials and styles, with excellent insulation values and smooth operation.

zonweringen.title: Sun Protection
zonweringen.description: Effective sun protection for optimal comfort in and around your home. Protect your interior from sunlight and create a pleasant indoor temperature.

rolluiken.title: Roller Shutters
rolluiken.description: Safe and stylish roller shutters that not only ensure your privacy but also provide extra insulation and protection against burglary.

keramische-tegels.title: Ceramic Tiles
keramische-tegels.description: Durable and stylish ceramic tiles for indoor and outdoor use. Create a seamless transition from your home to your terrace or garden.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Learn more about our company, our mission, and our commitment to quality and customer satisfaction.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: At Holland Veranda, we believe that a custom aluminum veranda or terrace cover adds real value to any home. It provides extra living space, protection from the weather, and a stylish extension of your house. With attention to comfort and sustainability, we create outdoor solutions that enhance your quality of life.

expertise.title: Expertise & Quality
expertise.description: With over 20 years of experience in installing verandas, carports, sliding walls, and roller shutters, we combine craftsmanship with modern techniques. We use only high-quality materials for durable outdoor solutions that withstand every season.

service.title: Personal Service
service.description: From the first contact to the complete installation of your veranda, canopy, or window frames, we guide you with personal service. We think along in solutions and ensure a smooth installation. Your satisfaction is always central at Holland Veranda.

company.title: Holland Veranda
